summary_text: A portrait of Lord Longford, a tireless British campaigner whose controversial beliefs often resulted in furious political debate and personal conflict.

name: The Private Eyes
summary_text: Scotland Yard sends a goofy pair to check on foul play at a mansion outside 1920s London.

name: The Skull
summary_text: A collector comes into possession of the skull of the Marquis de Sade and learns it is possessed by an evil spirit.

name: Subarashiki nichiyobi
summary_text: During a Sunday trip into war-ravaged Tokyo, despairing Yuzo and optimistic Masako look for work and lodging, as well as affordable entertainments to pass the time.

name: Boi Neon
summary_text: Iremar works at the rodeo in North East of Brazil. From his home, the truck used to transport the animals, he dreams of a future in the region's booming clothing industry.

name: Kokoda
summary_text: A bitter battle is fought between Australian and Japanese soldiers along the Kokoda trail in New Guinea during World War II.

name: Le péril jeune
summary_text: Ten years after their Upper Sixth, Bruno, Momo, Leon and Alain meet together in the waiting room of a maternity hospital. The father of the awaited baby is Tomasi, their best friend at that...                See full summary »

name: Gargoyles
summary_text: An anthropologist/paleontologist and his daughter, while travelling through the southwestern U.S., stumble upon a colony of living, breathing gargoyles.

name: London 2012 Olympic Opening Ceremony: Isles of Wonder
summary_text: The world's best all-round sporting event returns in 2012, this time in London, and England's capital has a lot in store.

name: The Tattoo
summary_text: An art dealer wants to buy a Modigliani, which is tattooed on the back of an old soldier.

name: Notre musique
summary_text: An indictment of modern times divided into three "kingdoms": "Enfer" ("Hell"), "Purgatoire" ("Purgatory") and "Paradis" ("Paradise").

name: Superman: The Last Son of Krypton
summary_text: The last survivor of the dead planet Krypton uses his amazing powers to defend people of his adopted world Earth.

name: Candy
summary_text: Candy Christian, an innocent high-schooler, encounters numerous colorful characters and humorous sexual situations while attempting to find meaning in life.

name: Forensic
summary_text: Samuel uses his forensic skills and discovers breakthroughs in a serial killing case as further victims are added to the list. Shikha teams up with Samuel and uncovers evidence that might lead to the killer's identity.

name: Dai zek lo
summary_text: A monk turned body-builder, with the gift to see into people's lives, befriends a female cop, and uses his gift to change the force of Karma and her destiny.

name: Benji the Hunted
summary_text: Benji is left in the wilderness after an accident. Can he survive?

name: The Stone Killer
summary_text: A top New York detective is sent to Los Angeles where he must solve a case involving an old Sicilian Mafia family feud.

name: White Snake
summary_text: A love story between a snake spirit and a snake hunter.

name: Görümce
summary_text: A couple decides to tie the knot and has to whether the storm that is the groom's older sister.

name: Small Town Murder Songs
summary_text: A modern, gothic tale of crime and redemption about an aging police officer from a small Ontario Mennonite town who hides a violent past until a local murder upsets the calm of his newly reformed life.

name: All Stars
summary_text: Leading up to their 500th match, the late twenty-something members of a Dutch amateur soccer team have their intimate bond put to the test as they each find themselves facing increasing responsibilities off the pitch.

name: Anjali
summary_text: After a few years, Chitra learns that her child, who was believed to be dead, is alive but is suffering from a mental illness. However, her family faces many challenges while looking after her child.

name: Plynace wiezowce
summary_text: The story of a young man discovering his homosexuality, while his girlfriend tries to cling onto him.

name: Itty Bitty Titty Committee
summary_text: High School grad and all American gal, Anna, finds her purpose and herself after she hooks up with the radical feminists in The Itty Bitty Titty Committee.

name: Sur un arbre perché
summary_text: Politician get hitch hikers on road and in one car accident they all end up on a tree above the sea.

name: Tarzan Rifki
summary_text: A naive man in search of a wife is mistaken for a hired killer by the mob. Things get complicated when he falls for the girlfriend of the mob boss.

name: Mr. & Mrs. Bridge
summary_text: Set during World War II, an upper-class family begins to fall apart due to the conservative nature of the patriarch and the progressive values of his children.

name: Ein Unbekannter rechnet ab
summary_text: Ten people are invited to a hotel in the Iranian desert, only to find that an unseen person is killing them one by one. Could one of them be the killer?

name: Man in the Wilderness
summary_text: Left for dead after a bear attack, a fur-trapper recuperates and pursues his former companions through dangerous Indian territory.

name: Black Angel
summary_text: When Kirk Bennett is convicted of a singer's murder, his wife tries to prove him innocent...aided by the victim's ex-husband.

name: Katti Batti
summary_text: A romantic comedy that follows Maddy and Payal's live-in relationship until a sudden turn of events creates a distance between them.

name: Man Vs.
summary_text: A mysterious stalker plagues a reality tv survivalist during his five days alone for a new season of his show in the northern Ontario wilderness; and the figure may not be human.

name: Walesa. Czlowiek z nadziei
summary_text: The depiction of the life of Nobel Peace Prize winner and founder of Poland's Solidarity movement, Lech Walesa, as events in the 1970s lead to a peaceful revolution.

name: Father's Day
summary_text: A murderer, a priest, and a delinquent try to bring down a father-killing madman.

name: Apne
summary_text: A disgraced ex-boxer attempts to make his two sons champion boxers in order to clear his name. One son agrees with this goal, but the other does not, causing family conflicts.

name: WiseGirls
summary_text: A new waitress working at an Italian restaurant in New York City finds herself entangled in a mob-run underworld of drug dealing and murder.

name: The Hanging Garden
summary_text: William, a once obese and depressed adolescent, is able to move past his teenage years when he moves to the city and comes out as being gay. When he returns home though, he can't cope with his memories.

name: Poh wai ji wong
summary_text: To prove himself to a love interest, a delivery boy learns dubious kung fu from an aging charlatan so he can challenge his archrival to a fight.

name: 7 Plus Seven
summary_text: Director Michael Apted revisits the same group of British-born children after a seven-year wait. The subjects are interviewed as to the changes that have occurred in their lives during the ...                See full summary »

name: Gate of Flesh
summary_text: An injured thief on the run finds sanctuary within a brothel of united, ruthless women.

name: The Divorcee
summary_text: When a woman discovers that her husband has been unfaithful to her, she decides to respond to his infidelities in kind.

name: Opening Night
summary_text: A failed Broadway singer who now works as a production manager must save opening night on his new production by wrangling his eccentric cast and crew.

name: Simon och ekarna
summary_text: Two boys come of age in Sweden during World War II.

name: Aladin
summary_text: Since he was a child, Aladin Chatterjee has been teased for his fairytale name. As a college student he follows his namesake's footsteps; unleashing genie Genius and wooing exchange student Jasmine. But the evil Ringmaster approaches.

name: Aguner Poroshmoni
summary_text: In the middle of the 1971;curfew is going on all over the Bangladesh. The liberation army is operated as effective guerrilla force - Badiul Alam is one them. Alam plans for starting ...                See full summary »

name: Agatha
summary_text: December 1926, Agatha Christie's husband asks for a divorce. She leaves her car and goes missing 11 days. She books into a hotel as Mrs. Neele. Fiction: A US reporter looks for her and investigates.

name: Shalako
summary_text: In 1880 New Mexico, a group of European hunters runs afoul of the Apache but is aided by an ex-cavalryman turned guide.

name: All Together
summary_text: Five old friends decide to move in together as an alternate to living in a retirement home; joining them is an ethnology student whose thesis is on the aging population.

name: Fisshu sutôrî
summary_text: Several seemingly unrelated but surprisingly intertwined tales reveal how a Japanese band that independently invented punk rock in 1975 is, 37 years later, connected to a comet that is about to destroy the world.

name: Angel
summary_text: Molly, a highschooler, secretly earns her living as Angel, a street prostitute whose only family and friends are the ones she works with on the streets. She has to survive against a serial killer who is targeting people of her profession.

name: Skjult
summary_text: Painful memories arise when Kai Koss goes back to his childhood home after 19 years and inherits his dead mother's house.

name: Georgia
summary_text: Sadie is desperately looking up to her older sister Georgia who is a famous C&W artist. Her desperate need to be accepted by her sister is constantly complicated by her drug and alcohol problems.

name: 2019: After the Fall of New York
summary_text: After a nuclear war, society breaks down into two groups, the evil Euraks and the rebel Federation. A mercenary named Parsifal is hired by the Federation to infiltrate New York City, which ...                See full summary »

name: People on Sunday
summary_text: Two men and two women enjoy a pleasant Sunday at the beach amid the unending toil of the working week.

name: Dirty 30
summary_text: When the party is on, it is off the hook! Kate has only a few days to turn her life around before she turns Dirty 30, but with three besties and zero rules, anything is possible!

name: Message Man
summary_text: A retired assassin's past catches up with him and his brutality surfaces as he goes on a final killing spree to make things right.

name: A Very Potter Musical
summary_text: Harry and his pals are in for adventure when the Dark Lord returns from the dead to take revenge on The Boy Who Lived! So take a ride on Voldemort's flying machine and get ready to go back to Hogwarts!

name: Frosty's Winter Wonderland
summary_text: Frosty's kind of lonely, so the kids think of making him a wife, Crystal. But will Jack Frost let them be happy?

name: La corta notte delle bambole di vetro
summary_text: An American journalist temporarily stationed in Central Europe searches for his new girlfriend, who has suddenly disappeared.

name: The Watcher
summary_text: Unaware of its terrible history, a young couple purchases their dream home. But it soon becomes clear that they may not be alone in the house... and that someone -- or something -- is determined to drive them out.

name: Kocan Kadar Konus: Dirilis
summary_text: Having weathered marriage pressures from family and friends in the first movie of the series, Efsun is now with the man of her dreams, Sinan. But the complications facing her love life ...                See full summary »

name: Sennentuntschi
summary_text: Three lonely herdsmen starved of female companionship creates the girl of their dreams, from a broom, some straw and a few rags. The creation - Sennentuntschi, lives and breathe to cook, clean and look after the three.

name: Master of the World
summary_text: In 1868, an American scientist and his team become hostages of fanatical pacifist Robur who uses his airship Albatross to destroy military targets on Earth.

name: Yardie
summary_text: British crime drama film directed by Idris Elba based on the novel of the same name by Jamaican-born writer Victor Headley.

name: Mike Tyson: Undisputed Truth
summary_text: Mike Tyson's one-man show is a fascinating journey into his storied life and career.

name: Scare Me
summary_text: During a power outage, two strangers tell scary stories. The more Fred and Fanny commit to their tales, the more the stories come to life in their Catskills cabin. The horrors of reality manifest when Fred confronts his ultimate fear.

name: Hellzapoppin'
summary_text: Olsen and Johnson, a pair of stage comedians, try to turn their play into a movie and bring together a young couple in love, while breaking the fourth wall every step of the way.

name: Dead Tone
summary_text: Finals at the prestigious University of Dreyskill are finally over and it's time to party. "The Crew", as they are known by their peers and dorm mates, are invited to a rich classmate's ...                See full summary »

name: Chocolat
summary_text: A French woman returns to her childhood home in Cameroon - formerly a colonial outpost - where she's flooded by memories, particularly of Protée, her servant.

name: Forced Vengeance
summary_text: A casino security guard is forced into violence from when the Hong Kong mob threatens his friends.

name: A December Bride
summary_text: A holiday wedding brings no joy to the bride's cousin, who was literally left by the groom right at the altar. But she might find her true love there when she gains a fake fiancé in the process.

name: Shark Attack
summary_text: In a once serene African fishing village, a marine biologist goes in search of some answers when his friend becomes a victim in one of a series of brutal shark attacks.

name: Obecná skola
summary_text: The time is 1945-46. 10 year old Eda and his friend Tonda live in a small village outside Prague. In school, their class is so wild and indisciplined that their teacher quits and is ...                See full summary »

name: Mystery Street
summary_text: A small-town policeman is assisted by a Harvard professor after the discovery of a human skeleton on a Massachusetts beach.

name: Zaman Makinesi 1973
summary_text: Spoiled son of a businessman is expelled from his fathers testament, left only with antique car that his father used in his youth. The car turned out to be the time machine..

name: The Sea Chase
summary_text: As World War II begins, German freighter Captain Karl Ehrlich tries to get his ship back to Germany through a gauntlet of Allied warships.

name: Amulet
summary_text: An ex-soldier, living homeless in London, is offered a place to stay at a decaying house inhabited by a young woman and her dying mother. As he starts to fall for her, he cannot ignore his suspicion that something sinister is going on.

name: The Fall of the American Empire
summary_text: A shy and insecure delivery truck driver accidentally arrives on the scene of a major crime and picks up two bags of cash and hides them. Only the help of a prostitute and a former biker released from jail might get him out of trouble.

name: When Strangers Appear
summary_text: A man enters a roadside diner run by a young woman and claims he is being chased by murderers.

name: My Life So Far
summary_text: Memoir of the lives of a family growing up on a post World War I British estate headed up by a strong disciplinarian, her daughter, her inventor husband, their ten year old son and his ...                See full summary »

name: Pociag
summary_text: Jerzy enters a train set for the Baltic coast. He seems to be on the run from something - as does the strange woman with whom he must share a sleeping compartment.

name: Fanfan la Tulipe
summary_text: Swashbuckling adventures of young army recruit Fanfan la Tulipe during the reign of King Louis XV in 18th Century France.

name: Yor, the Hunter from the Future
summary_text: A warrior seeks his true origins in a seemingly prehistoric wasteland.

name: Bicycling with Molière
summary_text: Two actors. One play. Can the differences between the two egocentric men be put aside for the sake of friendship and theatre?
